title: AWS GameKit now supports iOS and macOS games developed with Unreal Engine
content:
There’s some interesting news for game developers and gamers who play on Mac and mobile. Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced that developed with Unreal Engine.

description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced that AWS GameKit now supports iOS, macOS, and Andorid games developed with Unreal Engine.
